name: ESP_MultiResetDetector
keywords: rtc, eeprom, littlefs, spiffs, reset, data, esp32, esp32-c3, esp32-s2, esp32-s3, esp8266, double-reset, multi-reset, detector, double-reset-detector, multi-reset-detector
